name: CoursePark Learning Networks
tag_list: elearning, e-learning, learning-management-system, social-learning, marketplace, life-long-learning-profile
overview:
CoursePark is an cloud based learning management system, that incorporates a library, they refer to as marketplace, with over 3000 courses some of which are free and others are sold.

CoursePark strength is based in their learning networks which are basically groups of learning students studying the same course or maybe grouped by their employer. These learning networks allow their students to share information and discussion based on what they are studying, and allowing them to create friendships with other group members. This whole process is termed social learning.

CoursePark also has a world leading blog in eLearning and is prominently becoming the worlds No. 1 eLearning solution to many individuals and companies alike. CoursePark is allowing individuals to create life long learning profile, which is a life long record of ones career achievements and all courses they have ever completed and this can be shared with prospective employers.

external_links.title: CoursePark Announces Launch of New CourseMarket
